d: A FreeSewing pattern to test our various plugins

bannerDy.d: Distance perpendicular to the path the text is placed on

bannerRepeat.d: The amount of time the text should be repeated

bannerSpaces.d: The amount of spaces between repetitions of the text

bartackAngle.d: The angle of the line along which to bartack

bartackDensity.d: Controls how close together the stitches of the bartack are drawn

bartackEnd.d: Controls how far before the end the bartack stops

bartackLength.d: Controls the length of the bartack

bartackStart.d: Controls how far from the start the bartack begins

bartackWidth.d: Controls the widht of the (stitches making up the) bartack
